text: Wikipedia is overrated Please don t hate me for this but  I m starting to hate wikipedia  Everyone I know really likes it and are the kind of people who use it in their assignments before getting scolded  But i feel like it has gotten very very complex and crammed  For example  you wanna find something specific about the cold war  But search it on wikipedia and you ll get this long ass library of an article  And the headings don t even help especially if its very specific information you re looking for  You ll have to read paragraphs and paragraphs to find what you need and even then it is written vaguely or not given enough importance    If you feel the same please add to the reasons why in the comments  If you dont agree  please tell me why  I like hearing all opinions  Thanks
summary: Wikipedia has become too complex and crammed. Headings don't help and the content is vague or not given enough importance. If you feel the same, please add to the reasons why in the comments. If not, tell me why you don't.
cleaned: wikipedia complex crammed heading not help content vague not give importance feel add reason comment not tell not

text: Before I go  a word of advice about hanging yourselfThis isn t a post informing you how to hang yourself but how it feels and what the pain is like but if this gets removed  it won t matter  I ll probably be dead already  This is  I guess for educational purposes  for anyone considering hanging themselves It s not pleasant but you ve guessed that already  You re probably prepared for the pain but I can tell you that the pain is much different then you imagine  It s the weight of your whole body on the upper part of your neck Breathing isn t hard at first but you will gasp for air anyway  making the pain on your jaw and upper neck worse  The pain is horrid  You will start to struggle  even if you don t want to  You will try and get loose  It hurts and you re still conscious  you just want to be over but you re still very conscious People say you think about loved ones when you are dying but when you re hanging you just want to breathe  That s all that s on your mind  Just taking a breath and stopping the pain  You feel something break before you ll hear it  a small pop or even a crack That s when I got myself down  permanent damage to my throat and bruising all over my neck  Hanging is fucking painful
summary: Hanging is painful. It's the weight of your whole body on the upper part of your neck. You feel something break before you hear it. When hanging you just want to breathe and stop the pain. When he hung himself he got himself down with permanent damage to his throat and bruising all over his neck.
cleaned: hang painful weight body upper neck feel break hear hang want breathe stop pain hang get permanent damage throat bruise neck

text: Surviving a suicide attemptHello  it s been a while since my suicide attempt but creating a group for this has been on my mind for a while  After my attempt back in March  I had ended up in a rehabilitation center for a few days on an involuntary hold and after I left I was referred to a therapist who didn t help much  I decided that seeing him would be a waste of time and that I would find resources elsewhere  except after searching for a while  I realized that there were none  If you go online  there are a lot of groups for people who have lost someone to suicide  and people who are planning on committing suicide  but there was nothing for the people who attempted and failed  I never thought I would wake up and have to go back to living a normal life  as if nothing happened  but that s what s happening  I go through each day and it s like it never even happened  I don t know if it s me being in denial or my family just trying to push away from it but I haven t even spoken to my mom about it since I left the hospital and it makes me feel really alone sometimes  So I thought that maybe if there were people out there who are experiencing what I m experiencing and don t really know how to cope or who to talk to about it that we could talk to each other and maybe help each other through it
summary: After her suicide attempt back in March, she wants to create a group for people who have tried and failed to commit suicide. She hasn't spoken to her mom since she left the hospital and she feels very alone. She doesn't know how to cope with it.
